metadata.title: CVE-2023-46840 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect placement of a preprocessor directive in source code resultsin logic that doesn't operate as intended when support for HVM guests iscompiled out of Xen.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
